alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 10 at 10:46AM EST until December 10 at 11:15AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM EST FOR JEFFERSON...EASTERN THOMAS AND BROOKS COUNTIES... At 1046 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Coolidge to 14 miles east of Woodville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Quitman, Boston, Pavo, Coolidge, Barwick, Cody, Dills, Hells Half Acre, Grooverville, Lamont, Enon, Nash, Thomas City, Drifton, Waukeenah, Brooks Co A/p, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, and Dixie. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for Big Bend Florida...and south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
